name: Let's have lunch together!
description:
Let's have lunch together!

My game submission for GoedWare Game Jam #4. This jam's theme is space.

This game is about assigning a space in the lunchroom to everyone, so they can be happy and have a great experience. The relationships between people evolve over time, and they will require a different environment to sit it. Can you make sure everyone is happy with their space?

This game is played with mouse-only.

Credits:

Animation made with Mixamo.
